article_node.title: Stock Movers: Salesforce, American Eagle, T. Rowe Price
article_node.summary: Salesforce shares fell after the company warned of weak quarterly sales growth, raising doubts about its AI product’s impact amid competition from new AI vendors. American Eagle’s stock jumped 34% on stronger-than‑expected sales and a successful marketing campaign featuring Sydney Sweeney, boosting customer acquisition nationwide. T. Rowe Price shares rallied after Goldman Sachs announced a $1 billion investment, acquiring up to 3.5% of the asset manager to collaborate on private‑market products for wealthy investors.
